Title: Cloning a field _ Community
Author: missing
Text: Cloning fields can be a way to save time when creating new fields, particularly when there is a specific field setup that is to be repeated. All fields in a table can be cloned, regardless ofwhetherthe fieldshave been brought in from a data source or whether they were added later. Simple Mode Clone Structure Clone Values

Lists.heading: How to clone a field
list: Right-click on a field and click Clone Field to open the Clone Field dialog.
In the Name box, enter a name for the field.

For the cloning behavior, select one of the following two options: Clone structure: The cloned field will be an exact copy of the original field, including any transformations and validations. Clone values: The cloned field will be a custom field that gets its value from the original field.
Clone structure: The cloned field will be an exact copy of the original field, including any transformations and validations.
Clone values: The cloned field will be a custom field that gets its value from the original field.
